name: michigan-statewide-ballot-proposals-data
title: Michigan Statewide Ballot Proposals Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Michigan Statewide Ballot Proposals. Images of Michigan statewide ballot proposals scanned to PDF format from 1931-1999.
